item.title: Getting error help?

item.description:

                sM("you are in combat! you can't teleport!");
} else {
                ToX = 3281;
                ToY = 2766;
                sM("You teleport to the Donator zone!");
                sM("Have fun! - frostie");
}

Something like that maybe? I don’t know tbh.

if (inCombat = true;) {
^

if (inCombat = true;) {
^
client.java:7744: ‘else’ without ‘if’
} else {
^
3 errors
Press any key to continue . . .

[/code]

any suggestions
